name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a web application vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the server, leading to unauthorized access and deployment of a backdoor shell.

parallel--4b5cc71c-7317-42e4-9b5f-6ca5dc.name: Perform Immediate Mitigations
parallel--4b5cc71c-7317-42e4-9b5f-6ca5dc.description: Simultaneously kill malicious processes and delete dropped files.

action--d1baf75e-1c7d-4b8d-9d97-7d82aa2e.name: Kill malicious process
action--d1baf75e-1c7d-4b8d-9d97-7d82aa2e.description: Terminate any processes running the backdoor shell.

action--8e231c0e-c1fc-4fb4-9869-817c4ca8.name: Delete dropped files
action--8e231c0e-c1fc-4fb4-9869-817c4ca8.description: Remove all traces of the dropped backdoor shell script.

loop--6f6e11fc-4199-4c11-bb24-e5e82a37dc.name: Scan for additional vulnerabilities
loop--6f6e11fc-4199-4c11-bb24-e5e82a37dc.description: Run a vulnerability scanner in a loop until no more vulnerabilities are found.

action--6f6e11fc-4199-4c11-bb24-e5e82a37.name: Run vulnerability scan
action--6f6e11fc-4199-4c11-bb24-e5e82a37.description: Execute the vulnerability scanner to detect potential weaknesses.
